title: The Organized Mind Thinking Straight in the Age of Information
description: The Organized Mind Thinking Straight in the Age of Information Overload bestselling author and neuroscientist Daniel J. Levitin shifts his keen insights from your brain on music to your brain in a sea of details http://www.techbuzon.com/2017/12/how-to-change-your-mind-in-simple-way.html The information age is drowning us with an unprecedented deluge of data. At the same time, we’re expected to make more—and faster—decisions about our lives than ever before. No wonder, then, that the average American reports frequently losing car keys or reading glasses, missing appointments, and feeling worn out by the effort required just to keep up. But somehow some people become quite accomplished at managing information flow. In The Organized Mind, Daniel J. Levitin, PhD, uses the latest brain science to demonstrate how those people excel—and how readers can use their methods to regain a sense of mastery over the way they organize their homes, workplaces, and time

parsed.dn: The Organized Mind Thinking Straight in the Age of Information
parsed.name: The Organized Mind Thinking Straight in the Age of Information
